data.name: Add ALC details to Announcement Sendable
data.queryText:
select alc.lumen__Sender_Email_Name__c as fromName,alc.lumen__Sender_Email_Pofile__c as emailFromAddress,
alc.lumen__SMS_Sender_Profile__c as SMSSender,alc.lumen__WA_Sender_Profile__c as WASender,
alc.lumen__Channel__c as channel,alc.lumen__Email_Signature_Multiline__c as signature,
uniqueId ,elh.LetterheadHeader as emailHeader,elh.LetterheadFooter as emailFooter
from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/704d45b0-485c-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/704d45b0-485c-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/name}}] as a
Inner Join {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/9c8b44c7-9565-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/9c8b44c7-9565-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/name}}] as alc
on alc.lumen__Account__c = a.departmentId
INNER JOIN {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/5581e964-ab5e-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/5581e964-ab5e-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/name}}] as elh
on elh.id = alc.lumen__Email_Letterhead_Name__c
where lumen__type__c='SFMC' and lumen__Is_Active__c='True'
and a.sentstatus='False'
